Text.text: Use the Status Building block to display a DataField with criticality and provide a press event.
Note that the status of this building block is experimental and its API may change.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Usage of Status Building Block
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: To use the Status building block, you must define the metaPath pointing to a DataField or a property. The criticality of the DataField (or its DataFieldDefault) determines its color. You can attach a press event to the Status to handle user interactions.
